subject: Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Central Bank of Nigeria,
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District,
Cadastral Zone,
Abuja, Federal Capital Territory,
Nigeria
P.M.B. 0187,
Garki Abuja.
Nigeria
        WHY YOU HAVE NOT  SUCCEEDED IN RECEIVING YOUR FUND.
After waiting to hear from you or your Nigeria partners for a long
time now. I decided to make this direct approach to you in order not
to let it be as if I have anything in mind against you. I do not know
if you have asked yourself why each time the release of this fund is
approved, all of sudden, the payment will be stopped or one problem or
the other will come up. If you have not asked this question or you do
not know, this is an opportunity for me to tell you.
Some time ago, your Nigerian friend I mean the people that introduced
you to the project approached me through my dear wife who works with
the Federal Ministry of Finance and requested me to assist them
conclude a money transfer deal they had with you, they requested me to
assist them by removing the original contractors name, companyâ€™s name
and your bank particulars from Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Vetting
and replacing them with your name and your bank details in order to
make you appear as the rightful beneficiary of this funds. I agreed on
conditions that they would pay me US$100,000 as soon as your name
appears as the beneficiary. I did as agreed and demanded to be paid
but your friends started telling me stories.
They even told me that you promised to send money to me, do you know
that up till now, I have not received a single cent from them and have
not set my eyes on any of them.This is why i decided to hear from you
since your name has been enlisted along with other beneficiaries to
receive their funds.
But  based on their attitude, I decided to stop the funds release
movement because I cannot be denied my right in my own office
considering the risk as it might affect my job. Secondly, I know the
source of the funds that you did not execute any contract in Nigeria,
although I am the only person privileged to know this information and
it is a fact. Why I am making this clear to you is that I can see that
you are still making efforts in order to conclude this project.
Now I am ready to forget the past. I do not need the US$100,000 any
longer from you but a good compensation from your mind. I need your
assurance that your colleagues will be totally kept out of this
transaction. I know that none of them are aware of my new approach to
you. Stop spending your money unnecessarily on CBN Officers both here
and overseas because you will not receive this money without my hand
in it. I personally did the work at the beginning and only I can
perform it. The secret is that your partners failed to stamp duty on
your contract documents and it is the true fact.
Finally, I need your promise that no official of the Central Bank of
Nigeria will be aware of my involvement in this regard because of my
position. Now re-assure that you will be willing to compensate me.
That you will assist my wife to establish a foreign account in your
country where my compensation will be lodged. Also a KTT FUND RELEASE
APPROVALS DOCUMENTS will be sent to you for endorsement after which I
will remit the money within 48 hours. I am a man of my words, if you
are ready to conclude this business with me, kindly contact me so that
we can have a chat over this issue once and for all N/B: I will like
to inform you again based on the fact that you did not truly execute
any contract which am the only one privileged to know this i will
transfer this fund to fulfill my words,So what you are expected is to
follow my directives and instructions.
Firstly you will assure me of 100% confidentiality, secondly write a
promissory note that once i make this transfer you will as well return
my agreed percentage,Thirdly  you will assist me secure a nice school
for my son over there From your email to me, i stand to assure you that
you have my word on this. I shall help your family by making sure that
this fund is transferred into your account. You know the truth and if
you keep dealing with people that are deceiving you, you will only
have yourself to blame.I have told you sincerely  that nobody can get
this  fund for you because I have block every loopholes that no one
can get it for you without my consent, which I refer to the bad
behavior from those criminals throughout the time we were processing
this payment,I therefore urge you to forget about them and forge ahead
for better without remembering the past.
And as you have assured me that you will come out with a sincere mind
and be plain to me I will help and make this possible in 4 banking
days and it will not cost us much but a little because I am in charge.
As you  have  promised not to disappoint me, keep it secret, do away
with those of your colleagues even though you tell me that you did not
know about them, I will assist in every necessary way and transfer
this fund to you within four banking days. I am telling you again for
the second time you will today apply for legalization of your account
in the federal court of justice here so as to enable us transfer
without further delay.
You are lucky that you came in when we are about finishing the
compilation of this payment batch for the second quarter. Now you have
to agree that you will no longer be registered with the old contract
number but with a fresh  file as a millennium beneficiary to the
Federal Government of Nigeria of which all the file documents will be
forwarded to you in agreement while you still keep every thing secret
till you get this fund to your account. This is because your original
file can not be used in any way for this payment due to the dent and
irregularities in it, that is a fact and it has to be corrected.
Best Regard,
Prof. Williams Benald
CBN Director

subject: Re:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Hello Prof. Williams Benald,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite a story you've shared with me! It seems like there has been a lot of confusion and miscommunication in the past.

I'm curious about this project that my Nigerian friends introduced me to. Could you please provide more details about it? What exactly is the nature of this project?

Also, you mentioned something about a contract that I supposedly didn't execute in Nigeria. I'm not sure what you're referring to here. Could you clarify this point for me?

You also mentioned something about stamp duty on contract documents. What does that mean exactly? And why is it so important?

Lastly, I'd like to know more about your role in all of this. You said that no one can get the fund without your consent. Why is that? What is your position at the Central Bank of Nigeria?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Attn: Revecca

How are you today, thank you for your urgent response please kindly reconfirm your full details before we start the processing of this fund also note that this fund is real so all i need from you is trust okay.

I want to understand that my position here in CBN is the foreign opp oration unit so i know everything about the fund and bear it mind that as soon as you follow my instruction this fund will get to your account without any delay, all we need is for you to assist me in getting all the necessary documents secured and sign and i promise you that you will smile once again and please promise me that you will not betray me over this transaction.

Because i trust you that is why i contacted you so that we can finalize this transaction but believe me that this transaction that we are about to carry on is rist free so you should have no fear over it okay and i promise you that you will never regret it.

So kindly get back to me with your full details and your direct telephone numbers such as your whassapp line also so that we can communicate easily.
Regards,

Prof Williams Benald.

subject: Re: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Hello Prof Williams Benald,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your trust in me and your assurance that this is a risk-free endeavor. However, I would like to understand more about the process before we proceed further.

Could you please explain what kind of documents are needed for this? And how will these documents help in processing the fund? Also, could you provide more details about the fund itself?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Attn: Rebecca

Thank you for your urgent email, i want you to know that we are to secure four referents documents that will back up your fund and once we secure it today there will be no other thing that will delay the fund than to commence on the transfer of this fund immediately so all we need from you is for you to try your best and forward to me your full details and your account details to enable us start the processing of your fund.

Also note that the documents that we need to secure is FUND ORIGIN CERTIFICATE/ APPROVALS FROM THE PRESIDENCY/ CURT ORDER CERTIFICATE AND AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIM, so kindly note that this are the needed documents to secure and i will like you build trust on me as i have trusted you and that's why i contacted you in first place.

Please my dear sister note that once we secure all this documents we will have to go to the Nigerian curt of law and legalize it and that is where we will pay a little  fee which is the legalization fee only so please i promise you that you will not regret it just try as much as you can and be with me in this transaction because i really believe in you that is why i contacted you,my son will come over to meet you once the transfer is made to your account.

Please i need your urgent response so that we can start the processing of this fund kindly note that the only fee we are to pay is the legalization fee at the curt only and this is to ensure that this is real you have nothing to loose so please my dear sister i need your urgent reply now also note that all this documents needed before transfer because the documents will back up the fund okay so kindly get back to me now..
Regards,

Prof Williams Benald.

subject: Re: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Hello Prof Williams Benald,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Attn: Rebecca

Thank you, kindly forward to us your full detail and a copy of your identification and your direct telephone number also your whassap number so that we can talk more please.

Also get back to me on how you want to receive this fund as you can see you are the one delaying this, if you forward your information to us now the telex department will start the processing of the documents in your names immediately without any delay and once the documents are out i will forward to you copies of the documents.
Regards,

Prof Williams Benald.

subject: Re: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Hello Prof Williams Benald,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in learning more about this fund and how it works. Could you please provide me with more details? 

Also, could you explain the process of the telex department and what kind of documents they will be processing? I'm not very familiar with these terms.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: RE: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Attn: Rebecca

I have explain every thing to you so kindly get back to me with your full information as required also note note that telex department is where to submit your files of documents okay so kindly get back to me if you really need this fund and stop asking questions, i have told you that this is risk free so be free okay is real.

you can call me on my direct mobile number so that we can talk more +2349035507846 or you can as well give me your whassapp number so that we can talk okay.
Regards,

Prof Williams Benald.

subject: Re: RE: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Hello Prof Williams Benald,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you've shared with me about this opportunity. It's really interesting to hear about it.

I'm curious, could you tell me more about how this process works? And what is the role of the telex department in all of this?

Also, I'd love to know more about your experience in this field. How long have you been doing this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: RE: RE: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body: please there is no time for all this question okay

body:
Hello there! I understand you might be in a hurry, but it's always good to clarify things. Could you please provide more details about what you're referring to?

Best wishes,

subject: RE: RE: RE: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body: you ask to forward your full details such as your full house address and your banking details including your phone number and a copy of your identification

subject: Re: RE: RE: RE: RE: RE: RE:   Central Bank of Nigeria,
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't provide that information. But I'd love to hear more about what you're offering! Can you tell me more about it?

Best wishes,
Rebecca
